fields.label: Quick Help
fields.options:
💡 Quick guide to Bot Settings
  • Project Name — internal name for lists and search.
  • Employee Name — the public display name in chat.
  • Avatar & Bot Color — visual look of the widget.
  • Communication Tone & Personality Traits — how the bot speaks.
  • Core Principles — always-on guardrails and boundaries.
  • Additional Instructions — step-by-step behavior for preparing, answering, finishing.
  • Special Instructions — quick presets (e.g., be concise, don’t invent info).
  • Forbidden Topics — subjects the bot must avoid.
  • Target Actions — what the bot helps with (can be multiple).

Messages (JSON) use a simple language→text map. Example:

{
  "en": "Hello! How can I help you?"
}
  • Use standard language codes (e.g., en) and only those you actually need.
  • The most recently created bot is prioritized and shown first by default.
